text: Sano awala waakanile, itendo yao (yaakuionaga mpela yambone) ili chisawu lunyisinyisi lwaluli mulipululu (nkuli wambembembe). Jwanjota akasaluganichisyaga kuti mesi. Mpakana pati ali aluichilile ngakasachisimanapo chilichose (nombe najo kafili pajuchiiwichilila itendo yakwe yambone pa Kiyama ngasiyinkamuchisya), ni tachinsimana Allah kwalakweko jwatachinkwanilichisya chiwalanjilo chakwe. Soni Allah ni jwachitema pakuwalanjila
